Full Description: Akamas is the autonomous optimization platform that maximizes application performance, service reliability, and cloud cost savings.  Akamas helps performance engineers, developers, DevOps, platform engineers, and SREs be more productive, prevent incidents, and achieve aggressive optimization goals at enterprise scale.  Unlike infrastructure-focused cloud optimization tools, Akamas is application-aware, meaning that it optimizes full-stack configurations, taking into account application performance and reliability signals, SLOs, and user-defined constraints.  With support for both continuous optimization of live applications in production environments, and automated performance tuning of applications in test/pre-production, Akamas uses reinforcement learning AI, observability data, and safety constraints to autonomously identify and apply the best system configurations to achieve cost, performance, and reliability goals.  Founded by veterans in performance engineering, Akamas counts AWS, Dynatrace, Google Cloud, Gremlin, Mia-Platform, Micro Focus, RedHat, Tricentis, and Splunk among its technology partners. Akamas customers include leading financial services, SaaS software, and online consumer services brands.   Akamas is headquartered in Milan, with offices in Boston, Los Angeles, and Singapore.
Description: Akamas AI safely optimizes application workloads for maximum performance, service quality, resilience and cost.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

The Italian startup has developed a proprietary AI technology that creates a machine readable version of legal documents, by integrating cutting-edge AI techniques with an homogeneous legal standard. Aptus.AI’s machine readable format is applied to Italian and European financial regulations within an innovative RegTech solution that provides streamlined impact analysis, regulatory trends recognition and more. In fact this SaaS is automatically updated in real-time on regulatory changes and notifies them to users, thus allowing compliance professionals to make faster and more confident decisions, and also to anticipate business opportunities through compliance. With its solution Aptus.AI is bridging the gap between humans and financial regulations, but soon its technology will revolutionize the way people and machines interact with any law.

With a foundation built on cutting-edge technologies like AI, blockchain, and data analytics, AWorld offers a unique ecosystem designed to measure, incentivize, and educate users about their carbon footprint and the impact of their daily choices on the environment. The platform provides a dynamic and interactive experience through its AWorld ActNow app and API integration capabilities, enabling seamless incorporation into third-party applications, intranets, and systems. This versatile approach allows AWorld to engage a wide range of users, including employees, students, citizens, and consumers, in meaningful sustainability efforts. AWorld's innovative Impact Engagement™ methodology combines real-time monitoring of CO2 emissions with personalized recommendations, challenges, and rewards, encouraging users to adopt more sustainable lifestyles. Through gamification and micro-learning, the platform makes sustainability accessible and actionable for everyone, supporting organizations in their ESG and NetZero goals. Trusted by prestigious entities like the United Nations and the European Commission, AWorld has been recognized as the Best App for Good in 2023. Its client roster includes renowned global corporations, cities, universities, and event organizers, demonstrating the platform's scalability and effectiveness in driving change. Whether through its standalone app or integrated solutions, AWorld is dedicated to transforming environmental awareness into action, making it easier for individuals and organizations to contribute to a healthier planet. With a strong commitment to privacy, security, and user engagement, AWorld continues to innovate, providing tools and insights that empower users to make a real difference.

Full Description: EnerClock is at the forefront of the energy management revolution, providing cutting-edge digital solutions that empower users to optimize their energy usage and contribute to a sustainable future. EnerClock is a central component of this vision, offering a customizable interface that integrates seamlessly with various energy assets, including solar panels, EV chargers, and smart meters. Designed for flexibility and convenience, EnerClock allows users to monitor and control their energy consumption in real time. By providing insights into energy flows, costs, and emission reductions, the platform enables users to make informed decisions to enhance energy efficiency and reduce operational costs. EnerClock also features advanced functionalities such as load prioritization and remote diagnostics, ensuring that users can maintain optimal energy management without the help of onsite technicians. EnerClock’s platform is built on the XENON framework, which connects distributed energy resources into a cohesive system. This integration supports various use cases, from home energy management to large-scale virtual power plants, making EnerClock a versatile solution for both residential and commercial users. The platform is fully customizable, allowing businesses to incorporate their branding and tailor the interface to their specific needs. With robust security features, including two-factor authentication and over-the-air updates, EnerClock ensures that user data is protected while maintaining the latest software capabilities. The company’s commitment to innovation and sustainability makes EnerClock a leader in the energy management sector, driving the transition to a decentralized and sustainable future.
Description: Energy Management, IoT, Artificial Intelligence
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Top 5 Investors: CDP Venture Capital, Plug and Play, 360 Capital, Vertis, Join Capital
Industry Groups: Manufacturing, Science and Engineering, Software, Transportation
Full Description: We develop software that generates real-time embedded digital twin solutions for model predictive control and diagnostics of electromechanical systems, enhancing performance, longevity, and reliability. In essence, our toolchain creates a precise digital replica of a physical device, such as an electric motor or generator, in order to accurately model the electrodynamic and thermodynamic behavior of the system across a wide range of operating conditions. We then apply our proprietary mathematical approach to exponentially reduce the computational complexity of this model—so much so, in fact, that our digital twin can be integrated into the device itself to compute in real-time, “on-chip,” as part of an amazingly fast and accurate firmware solution. By accurately predicting temperatures and other critical system parameters thousands of times per second, our Digital Twin On-Chip solutions not only provide unprecedented insight for real-time control techniques to enhance system performance, but also pave the way for data-as-a-service capabilities such as predictive maintenance, monitoring of component aging, and anomaly detection.
Description: We are accelerating the large-scale deployment of digital twin technology in the automotive and automation industry
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: Servitly helps OEMs and service providers harness data from connected products to redesign and enrich their after-sales services and processes, through a Cloud-based, configurable IoT application. Through Servitly services also become "Connected". This allows organizations to reduce costs and risks of their after-sales operations, enrich their offerings with IoT-enabled solutions, establish lasting relationships with customers, generate new recurring revenue streams from subscriptions, spare parts and consumables and new service models, like Equipment-as-a-Service. The application is made up of a Connected Customer Portal, giving end customers capabilities like remote monitoring and control, troubleshooting, performance advisory, reporting, subscriptions, spare parts and consumables purchase, and a Digital Control Room, giving all the after-sales professionals capabilities like remote diagnostics, installed base monitoring and alerting, smart proactive maintenance planning, purchase orders management. The software integrates with existing IoT technologies to collect raw data from connected products, processes data to extract actionable information, triggers business processes within other information systems, like FSMs, and provides information and digital capabilities to all stakeholders in the value chain: organization, end customers, third parties. The most distinguishing feature of Servitly is the Console, a no-code environment for configuring all organization-specific application details. Through it, Servitly offers a "buy and configure" alternative to companies that are not satisfied with the "make" of resource-intensive, slow-growing, difficult-to-manage, and incomplete homegrown solutions. Established in 2019, Servitly is now trusted by more than 40 customers in Europe, operating in different industries like HVAC, Food, Water, Energy, Industrial Processing and Packaging, to deliver Connected Services bound to more than 23,000 Connected Products.
Description: IoT SaaS helping OEMs and service providers redesign and enrich after-sales processes by harnessing connected products data

Full Description: Agrobit develops digital farming solutions based on imaging (smartphone, drones) to help farmers getting better decision in agro-inputs management. The flagship product is the mobile app iAgro, the first quantitative Decision Support System to optimize pesticide treatments and digitize crops (digital twin) quickly and easily just using a smartphone. The competitive advantages are to provide information unobtainable from other technologies (field sensors, satellites), the use of proprietary AR, AI and computer vision algorithms and the possibility to reach a huge number of users that cannot make high investments but are the majority in Europe (small/medium farms). The app uses AR to 3D-scan plants (tree crops) and in-cloud AI and computer vision algorithms to re-create the 3D model (digital twin) of the scanned plant, in order to calculate its biometrics (canopy thickness, height, volume), vigor parameter (LAI) and field parameters (LWA, TRV). Finally, a mathematical model estimates the correct pesticide doses to be distributed.
Description: Agrobit develops digital farming solutions using AI, AR and computer vision to help farmers taking better decisions in farm management

Full Description: Ganiga is a deep tech company that combines advanced robotics and a proprietary Generative AI platform to transform waste management into an automated, data-driven process. Our technology is designed to recognize, sort, and analyze waste in real time, while also tracking weight and environmental impact, including CO₂ emissions. We aim to solve the inefficiencies of traditional waste handling by creating intelligent, scalable solutions that help businesses and public infrastructures reduce operational costs, optimize recycling processes, and improve sustainability reporting. Ganiga’s ecosystem includes: Hoooly!Indoor: A smart bin designed for indoor spaces like airports, offices, and malls. It automatically identifies waste types and directs items to the correct compartment, while collecting live data on volumes, materials, and environmental impact. Hoooly!Small: A retrofit AI-powered cover that transforms existing bins into smart systems. Equipped with cameras and sensors, it identifies the waste before disposal and automatically opens the correct section, improving sorting accuracy without replacing existing infrastructure. Hoooly!Food: A modular system designed to monitor and reduce food waste in corporate cafeterias, restaurants, and large-scale food services. Using computer vision and precision scales, it tracks discarded food, providing insights to minimize waste and optimize purchasing. Ganiga operates through a Hardware + SaaS model, combining product sales with recurring revenue from software services that manage analytics, system updates, and predictive maintenance. Our mission is to turn waste into measurable, actionable data and become the global reference for automated sustainable waste management, enabling companies to achieve their ESG goals with traceability, transparency, and operational efficiency.
Description: The startup developing software and AI-powered robots sas to revolutionize waste management.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: ViteSicure is the first insurtech that transforms the policy buying experience by making it affordable, self-service and instantaneous for the multitude of financially vulnerable people. It is the only case of life protection insurance on demand that is sustainable not only because it is completely paperless but also because it's inclusive thanks to products developed directly with RGA, a world leader in life reinsurance. It's also instant thanks open API platform that allows full digital customer onboarding through a need-based product proposition. Last but not least it is self service: in 3 minutes customers in a single process purchase and download the Policy online with the support of digital tools such as the Protection Calculator and the human touch of the excellent omni-digital customer service. viteSicure, brand of the insurance broker Bridge insurance Services is authorized to distribute insurance products in the European Economical Space and guaranteed by a Team with over 25 years of expertise in insurance, marketing and tech. Why viteSicure In Italy, 48% of families do not save, 61% suffer from anxiety about the economic future of the family and only 6% have life protection insurance. This is called Protection GAP (difference between resources needed and available at the death of the head of the family) and is a worldwide problem while companies are still focused on offering savings products, not aligned with the new buying habits of customers, with complicated and old processes, ignoring the millions of financially vulnerable customers. Customers are online, reacting to advertising and using technology and so we believed that digital transformation was the solution to engage customers, educate them about the insurance solution, reduce the distance to insurance and meet the demands and needs immediately. Technology is our enabler for reaching the financially vulnerable. Our open API platform enables fully digital processes not only with insurance companies as is the case with most digital brokers but across the entire value chain thus enabling full transformation and integration of processes. We use APIs for partner integration, for the omni-digital customer service system and even for trustpilot for example. viteSicure is therefore the only one that boasts a fully digital customer onboarding, marketing funnel and customer service that for the customer means a quick and easy journey for a unique insurance buying experience that is aligned with their buying habits. ViteSicure is backed and invested by RGAX (Reinsurance Group of America) and Reale Mutua Insurance Group
Description: ViteSicure is a fully digital insurtech broker that provides financial products with a high premium level digital customer experience.

Full Description: Launched in 2018, dropout is an Italy-based business specialised in the sale of authentic limited edition sneakers and streetwear. With a highly trafficked flagship store located in the centre of Milan, dropout proved a huge success right from the start: over 1000 people attended to the store on its opening weekend, and its doors have seen over 50000 visitors from all over the world.  The e-commerce dropoutmilano.com has seen millions of visitors and thousands of sales, guaranteeing authenticity of all products shipped and providing free delivery across EU. To support the business activities, dropout's team have developed a software of technical analysis for the secondary streetwear market, named HypeAnalyzer. In dropout, pricing and marketing are automated and data-driven by HypeAnalyzer algorithms. Output of these also include data for consignment rates (dynamic and affected by things such as volatility and demand, objectively calculated) and discounts. dropout is looking to scale this, simple yet efficient, model, for many other things retail and e-commerce and is currently studying the creation of a portal for investment in sneakers as alternative assets. HypeAnalyzer is covered by commercial patent in Italy (SIAE, D000014993) and dropout® is trademarked at continental level. Initially opened with no external funding, in October 2021 dropout launched its first funding round, raising €750k via equity crowdfunding in a lightning 6 days, following the board approval of an extension of the initial €500k goal (reached in 4 days out of a 62 days campaign). The move will see dropout open a new retail location as well the opening of several temporary locations throughout Italy; improve its e-commerce and the further development of HypeAnalyzer. The campaign saw the participation of 2 Italian VC funds and over 150 retail investors, who join the founding team made of Kola Tytler, Andrea Canziani, Federico Pasquetti and Stefano Zeppieri.
Description: Business specialized in the sale of limited edition sneakers and streetwear

The Championship: Users have a budget of 500 Fantamillions to assemble a team of 30 riders, featuring all UCI World Tour team riders, carefully illustrated by our designers. Each race requires a lineup of 9 riders, with the goal of scoring points as more of your riders finish in top positions. Compete against teams from all over the world and showcase your strategic skills! Private or Public Leagues: Whether you're playing with friends or meeting new people, users can create leagues with fully customizable rules. Invite as many friends as you like, or set up a public league and connect with fellow fans via geolocation. Users can also form teams through online or offline auction methods, envelopes mode, or using the quotation list provided by Fantacycling staff. Throughout the season, we host Special Events in collaboration with sponsors, tied to some of the most iconic races in the cycling world. Players can win exciting prizes and take part in thrilling challenges. We are proud of our active community, with over 125,000 registered users, more than 80,000 playing in the global championship, and over 15,000 leagues already formed. Our strong presence on social media includes an Instagram account with high engagement, a Telegram channel with over 2,500 users and 3,000 messages per day, and a YouTube channel offering race analysis with live streaming sessions that attract a large audience and nearly 3 million views. Additionally, we host a popular weekly TV show every Thursday on Bike Channel TV (available on SKY and DTT). Join the fun and challenge yourself to become the ultimate fantasy cycling manager!

Industry Groups: Administrative Services, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment
Full Description: 20Seconds is an innovative smartphone App that merges the concept of a Social Network with that of a talent show for the world of work, offering a revolutionary way to search for and find professional opportunities. The distinguishing feature of 20Seconds is the format of the videos, limited to 20 seconds, which users can use to introduce themselves, showcase their skills, their business or promote projects. This quick and direct approach is designed to capture the attention of companies and employers effectively, leveraging visual impact and conciseness. Below are the main features. Job search: the platform allows users to search for their dream job through an intuitive and user-friendly interface. Search results can be filtered according to the user's preferences, allowing for greater customization and a more targeted search. The “Find” section is dedicated to workers seeking opportunities, while the “Hire” section is designed for companies that are looking for staff. Home and algorithm: The 20Seconds homepage features videos suggested by a proprietary algorithm that takes user preferences into account, offering two types of feeds: trending (videos with more insights) and recent (by upload date). Users will be able to comment, interact, and “like” the best worker performances or the best job proposals from companies. Instant messaging and notifications: 20Seconds integrates an instant messaging system that allows users to stay in touch with potential employers or employees. In addition, the notifications section keeps users updated on interactions with their profile, such as likes and comments on uploaded videos, ensuring continuous engagement. Work status and multi-user: users can report their work status directly on their profile, choosing from several options such as “Available for work,” “Busy but interested in other proposals,” or “Busy.” This feature is useful for immediately indicating one's availability to companies and vice versa. In addition, the platform supports multi-user profiles, allowing you to easily switch between them. ID badges and “Search”: to facilitate navigation, 20Seconds uses badges that distinguish between workers and companies, allowing each user's category to be immediately identified. In addition, users can explore the “Search” section to find new content and specific opportunities through numerous filters. Premium projects and videos: the platform also includes a dedicated projects section, ideal for innovators seeking funders. This space offers a unique opportunity to present innovative ideas in 180 seconds and attract investors. In addition, 20Seconds offers premium video options that allow workers and companies, to extend the duration of videos up to 60 seconds. 20Seconds represents a new frontier in the world of job search and personal promotion, combining the power of social media with the practicality of a talent show. With its many features, the platform offers a dynamic and interactive way to connect talent and opportunities, radically transforming the way people present themselves in the job market.
Description: The world's first app that lets you find a job in 20 seconds.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: FLEEP Technologies designs and develops printed electronics solutions for the biomedical and smart packaging sectors. The company is a spin-off of Istituto Italiano di Tecnologia. FLEEPtech developed a proprietary process for the fabrication of polymer-based integrated circuits based on Organic Thin-Film Transistors, creating the intelligent core for electronics systems that are mechanically flexible, printed like magazines and recyclable. FLEEPtech is the missing link in the printed electronics industry between a great number of flexible and printed products (i.e. sensors, actuators and energy supplies) that find little space in being integrated with standard non-flexible electronics. For such reasons, the company's mission revolves around the realization of a general purpose platform, namely PrintIC, for the manufacturing of fully-printed systems on chip.
Description: FLEEPtech design and develops printed systems on chip based on a proprietary printed OTFT technology.

Full Description: Rosso is a startup dedicated to eliminating the blood shortage crisis in Italy by serving as a connective tissue in the blood supply chain, collaborating with schools, universities, donor associations, and hospitals. Our primary goal is to reduce patient wait times by increasing the number of donors, particularly young donors. Currently, Generation Z is not donating blood significantly; the average donor age is 45, while donation is allowed from 18 to 65 years old. Through innovative social media campaigns and a booking platform, we raise awareness among young people, encouraging them to book donations at nearby centers and providing instant chat access with hematologists to address their concerns. For companies, we offer a welfare service and sustainability membership that engages employees in health prevention and blood donation. We organize awareness webinars, donation days, and monitor employee health, providing impact reports. These activities are included in the company's sustainability report and contribute to B-Corp certification. Our third pillar involves management software for hospitals. We offer a plugin that optimizes blood stock management in hospitals by managing donor portfolios and the relationships between donors, associations, and hospitals. By knowing the blood stock levels, we can send automatic recalls or alerts when blood is needed and there are donors nearby ready to donate. With the help of AI, we can predict future blood stock needs, required blood types, and the timing of potential shortages.
Description: Making Blood Donations Cool
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: Confirmo is a SaaS platform for all organizations that need to digitize processes that require a legal signature. Thanks to multimedia and a virtual assistant based on artificial intelligence, the application allows users to sign a document such as a contract, a consent, or a terms and conditions form with access to all the information necessary to understand it clearly and reasonably.  The integrated learning assessment system offers digitally documented evidence of understanding that can be used in the event of a lawsuit. In addition to providing a paperless document flow, Confirmo is compliant with the strictest privacy regulations such as the GDPR, significantly simplifying the work of Data Protection Officers. The software can be integrated with all existing systems and is available for all customers, from single professionals to large companies. The application, designed to be easily used by anybody, already has thousands of successfully signed documents. Confirmo, thanks to the fully-aware digital platform,  revolutionizes digital signature providing greater transparency and legal protection.

Holo offers services specifically designed to help freelancers track their key metrics, get paid in fiat currencies or cryptocurrencies, as well as request automation of recurring payments, with automated e-invoicing. As soon as you receive a payment, our system will automatically create the document in electronic format and send it to the SDI.  Holo is therefore a Fintech product that was created to automate the process of the active cycle of freelancers, a reality that has numerically exploded in the last 3 years both in Italy and in Europe.  Our billing system is accredited by the SDI (Italian interchange system) and already complies with the European Peppol standard. Our system keeps track of your flow by reconciling payments and invoices: you'll have everything ready for drafting the flat-rate accounting. It can all be integrated with the accounting systems already present on the market. The open-banking system will carry out all reconciliations automatically. Finally, we will be the first SaaS ever to bring order and transparency to crypto payments!  Holo is therefore a Fintech product that was created to automate the process of the active cycle of freelancers, a reality that has numerically exploded in the last 3 years both in Italy and in Europe.  see our ppt presentation: https://bit.ly/getholovisualdeck

Full Description: Treepli is an itinerary marketplace for independent travelers, inspired by the travel sharing economy and dedicated to curious people seeking authentic and personalised experiences. How does it work? We built a digital platform to facilitate the exchange of travel ideas and tips, where the ones looking for inspiration for their next destination can meet the stories of those who have already been there. Treepli is a community of travelers where the most experts become content creators, proposing detailed itineraries, including all info regarding where to sleep, how to move around, what to do and must-see places. All these useful recommendations are shared together with their own storytelling, made of photos, images and emotions experienced along the way. On the other hand, users that are willing to plan a trip, thanks to these genuine and first-hand tips, can organise each stop in a simple and intuitive manner. Just need to pick and choose an itinerary among the ones available in the portal, customise it based on the personal needs, and finally book each single travel product, from the outbound flight to the museum entrance fee, in a single seamless flow. This is a win-win mechanism: who is looking for ideas but is not willing to get the usual pre-packaged tour can actually create his own tailored trip, who shares his stories and hidden gems can value his experience, getting rewarded based on how many users he inspired to hit the road. Our project has already left the dock: are you ready to jump on board and join us?
Description: Treepli is a digital platform for independent travellers, providing a marketplace to exchange bookable user-generated itineraries.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: We are an innovative start-up in the B2B sector of precious jewelry. We have made an important innovation in production and in distribution that allows the jeweler to be the protagonist inside of their business and to have a very important saving compared to traditional purchase channels for precious jewels. If you are a jeweler, thanks to our platform you can create a jewel precious to your brand by choosing from over 100,000 unique items by customizing each detail according to your needs. The jewels are 100% made in Italy, in Valenza, by the same craftsmen who usually work as subcontractors for the brands mentioned in the jeweler is a dealer. These subcontractors are managed with a technological system and innovative that allows the traceability of orders and raw materials on time real. Personalization of the jewel by choosing model, size, type, and quality of the stones, type, and weight of the chain, size of the butterflies. The engraving of your brand will allow you to make your collection unique. High-tech platform that independently manages production through the various subcontractors, checking the progress in real time up to internal quality control. The platform is a system that allows the jeweler to create a line of jewelry under its own brand to retain its customer by playing the role of jeweler and not dealer. Thanks to the disintermediation of realized processes with the platform the value for money is on average cheaper 30% above normal market prices. 97% of jewelers re-direct the credibility that their client recognizes towards a precious jewel branded with a label not known by the consumer and suggested by the jeweler himself. This label affixed by a distributor who had the jewel made by various subcontractors cannot be called a brand because: - Does not make models with identifiable design; - Does not carry out marketing operations to convey the consumer to jewelry. 80% of the precious jewels sold have a classic design and are not purchased for the brand they report. Become a protagonist in your jewelry, retain your customer, increase your margins and offer a better value for money We offer the possibility of being a partner in our start-up to a maximum of 100 jewelers. In fact, We are selecting some jewelers to make them an active part of our project.  For us, it is important to have partners who are our references to understand the requests and needs of consumers as well as jewelers themselves. Being our partner means: Participate in an innovative start-up that aims to revolutionize the market jewelry in Italy and Europe, acquiring shares that will multiply the future value;  Enjoy tax deductions of 50% of the invested capital; Receive a course that helps both the owner and the sellers to propose and sell the own-brand jewelry;  Transparent knowledge of data, analysis, and margins that the platform applies; Have a fixed and clear discount that allows the partner to buy with a price lower than normal customers will do in the future; Being able to create a jewelry configurator with the brand and colors of your jewelry; Being able to integrate a custom configurator on your own site to offer a customization experience to your customers. Are you a jeweler? Sign up for free by accessing our portal or writing to us,  we will send you an information document and we will contact you by phone to tell you about the additional benefits enjoyed by our partners.
Description: An innovative start-up in the B2B sector of precious jewelery.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Industry Groups: Energy, Natural Resources, Science and Engineering, Sustainability
Full Description: Aquaseek has developed a game-changing atmospheric water generation technology. Atmospheric water generators are systems that can generate liquid water from atmospheric vapor. The chiller-based AWGs use mechanical compression of vapor to cool down a surface until the humidity condenses, like an air conditioner. Full Description: Vammon is a Saas platform designed for logistics optimization, using it you can manage your logistics flows In/Out collaborating with customers and suppliers who are companies or transporters. It is possible to manage price auctions, book loads, issue transport orders, confirm availability of material, manage travel documents, certificates, communications between the parties and traceability of the goods, but also manage transport problems, reservations of loading and unloading at the loading docks or on third-party platforms, and all WITHOUT making phone calls or writing emails. All this collected data provides detailed analysis on flows allow you to define the best routes, analyze times or quantities of material shipped to evaluate variations in work programs. It is finally possible to have certain data on the impact generated for Scope 3, in fact every transport is managed separately from the others and has, among other things, certain data on the vehicles used and the distances travelled, and therefore on the impact generated. We calculate that a company that moves 500 packages (in different shipments) can save up to 1500 hours of work in one year. The target customer is any company that produces, processes, reworks or markets products that needs to ship material on pallets or in large boxes that cannot be moved manually or without the use of transport equipment handling, or companies that need to manage arrivals and departures from their warehouses, or freight forwarders or couriers who handle large quantities of material. To date, Saas Vammon seems to be the only one that allows the management of shipments and dialogue between company/transporter/supplier at 360 degrees and without constraints, all other platforms are for use exclusive to the customers of individual transporters or forces customers to exchange messages and emails for negotiations.
Description: Vammon is an artificial intelligence algorithm that helps transporters find a load.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: Clubbing - Profilo Crunchbase Descrizione: Clubbing è l’app leader in Italia dedicata alla nightlife, progettata per connettere i clubbers con i migliori locali ed eventi. La piattaforma offre un ecosistema completo per prenotare biglietti, tavoli VIP e pacchetti personalizzati, oltre a gestire in modo efficiente la promozione e le operazioni per i club. Con oltre 200.000 utenti registrati e un transato di 4 milioni di euro, Clubbing sta trasformando il modo in cui la nightlife viene vissuta e gestita, unendo innovazione digitale e semplicità d’uso. Value Proposition: Clubbing è progettata esclusivamente per il settore della nightlife, offrendo: 	•	Per i club: Strumenti per la gestione di biglietti, tavoli e liste d’ingresso, con una dashboard analitica per monitorare le performance in tempo reale. 	•	Per i clubbers: Un’esperienza semplice e intuitiva per scoprire, prenotare e vivere serate personalizzate nei locali più esclusivi. Differenziazione: A differenza di piattaforme generaliste come Ticketsms, Clubbing è specializzata nella nightlife. Questa verticalità ci consente di offrire: 	•	Funzionalità mirate per i club: Gestione avanzata di tavoli e ingressi, marketing personalizzato e strumenti di promozione. 	•	Un’esperienza unica per gli utenti: Suggerimenti basati su preferenze e posizione, oltre a un sistema di prenotazione intuitivo. 	•	Fees competitive: Una struttura di costi ottimizzata per supportare il successo dei locali. Mercato: Clubbing si rivolge esclusivamente al settore della nightlife italiana, con un focus su: 	•	Club e organizzatori di eventi: Strutture di piccole e medie dimensioni che vogliono digitalizzare i processi. 	•	Clubbers tra i 18 e i 35 anni: Giovani attivi, orientati al digitale e alla personalizzazione delle esperienze. Dati chiave: 	•	Fondazione: [anno di fondazione] 	•	Sede: Milano, Italia 	•	Utenti registrati: Oltre 200.000 	•	Transato: Oltre 4 milioni di euro 	•	Investitori principali: Pirallini, Vellutini, De Matteis, Alessandro Bechelli Mission: Rivoluzionare il mondo della nightlife, digitalizzando ogni aspetto dell’esperienza notturna per club e clubbers, creando connessioni più semplici e sicure. Vision: Diventare il punto di riferimento per la nightlife, unendo tecnologia, dati e community per ridefinire l’intrattenimento notturno. Contatti: 	•	Sito web: clubbingapp.it 	•	Email: info@clubbingapp.it 	•	LinkedIn: Clubbing su LinkedIn 	•	Instagram: @clubbing.app Categoria: Software per eventi, E-ticketing, Nightlife.

SaidText operates through a supervised dashboard where workers can submit requests for parts, assistance, or any other needs. These requests can be accompanied by images or videos, providing a comprehensive understanding of the situation at hand. The supervisor monitoring the dashboard can then respond promptly, ensuring smooth operations and minimal downtime. This tool is not just about communication; it's about data and insights. By recording and measuring the time taken in these requests and communications, SaidText provides valuable data that can be used to analyze and improve internal processes. This Lean approach can significantly reduce costs in your organization by enhancing efficiency and productivity.

On top of that, by answering some quick questions on the website, the 99bros machine learning algorithm suggests the most suitable insurance coverage, which can be purchased online by the customers in a few seconds.  In particular, 99bros solves the pension problem of the younger generations: the labor market is increasingly precarious, the average age increases and the withdrawal of the State from some areas of social support is inevitable; traditional insurance networks do not favor pension products as they are not very profitable, while 99bros takes advantage of digital channels and the young people’s attitude to investigate independently and buy online, to solve the problem allowing customers to subscribe to a pension fund in a breeze. Industries: Management Information Systems, Pet, Social Impact, Software
Industry Groups: Community and Lifestyle, Information Technology, Other, Social Impact, Software
Full Description: Empethy is a digital platform that aims to facilitate pet adoptions in Italy. In particular, people looking to adopt a pet can choose their own location (region/city where they are looking to adopt), apply a number of filters to find their perfect match (e.g. size, weight, gender, age, compatibility with elderly, other animals, etc.) and send the application form directly to the shelters by filling out the online form. Once the adoption request has been sent, users will be able to access their own private area where they will be able to monitor the status of their request (online form accepted/rejected, the face-to-face meeting passed/rejected, adoption accepted/rejected). In addition to this, Empethy offers a personalized online consultation service in order to provide an array of useful tips and advice aimed at "preparing" the future adopter for a conscious and responsible adoption of the future dog/ cat. On the other hand, animal shelters, rescue groups, volunteers can upload their adoption ads easily and quickly by filling out a standardized online form containing all the information needed for a conscious adoption decision (e.g. personal data, vaccinations/castrations, special needs, pathologies, etc.). Once created their own profiles, associations will be able to access their private area, where they will be able to manage all incoming requests (accept/reject the online form, accept/reject face-to-face meeting, accept/reject adoption) for each individual pet in a more standardized and automated way. Empethy's mission is to encourage responsible pet adoption in order to ensure a long-term relationship between humans and animals and prevent the abandonment of other animals. When selecting a companion animal for life, the compatibility of the personality traits, needs, and lifestyle should always be considered. Indeed, each animal has its own history and needs, which may or may not correspond to the lifestyle and needs of the future owner.
Description: The first Italian platform that is changing the way people find, choose and adopt a pet!

Industries: B2B, CleanTech, GreenTech, Robotics, Smart Cities
Top 5 Investors: Cassa Depositi e Prestiti, Key Capital, LVenture Group

Full Description: Pixies is a hi-tech startup that has developed a zero-impact system that combines Autonomous Mobile Robots, equipped with AI, and smart solar-powered benches, in which the robots are stored and re-charged. The system was created to solve the cleaning problem in urban contexts directly through the city. Indeed, the mobile robots are little autonomous sweepers, which are able to get around the surroundings whilst collecting waste and avoiding obstacles, both static and dynamic, to then dock inside the bench and be charged thanks to solar energy.  Our aim is to develop an urban space which takes advantage of IoT devices, scattered around the city, to constantly sense and respond to the environment, while collecting useful data that will improve the management of the entire urban realm.  Pixies’s strength is its bottom-up approach to the problem of cleaning within cities, which ensures a very high level of efficiency, since it is a 24/7 on site, quick and sustainable solution. Moreover, thanks to the presence of the smart benches, we will have fixed charging stations directly installed around the city, thus giving a new piece of urban furniture, useful both for the environment and for the citizens. It's important to point out that the implementation of Pixies for cleaning purposes is only the beginning. Please, bear in mind that this system can be used within cities for a thousand other applications (delivery, first aid, mobile charging for vehicles, etc.), always remaining bottom-up, efficient and sustainable because it is embedded with the urban space. The competitive advantage of Pixies is its bottom-up approach to the problem of cleaning. Indeed, Pixies integrates the robots directly into the city, through the use of smart benches as charging bases for them. So far, Pixies has installed the prototype of the robot and the smart bench in the courtyard of the mixed-use building ( residential, hotel and offices) where the company is based, here in Rome, making it active and supervised by ourselves every day.  The system works perfectly. It's able to operate up to 8 hours per day, covering an area of 2'000 sqm, both indoor (300 sqm) and outdoor (1'700 sqm).  As results, the cleaning efficiency has been increased of about 30% and the related cost has been, therefore, reduced of about 40%. Our closest competitors are : Trombia, Enway, Idriverplus, TSM. However, we can also add to these other companies that have developed solutions for the autonomous indoor cleaning. These are, for instance: Fybots,Cyberdyne, Avidbots, Adlatus and Makita.
Description: Pixies is a hi-tech startup that designs solutions for Autonomous Cities and a more sustainable future of our planet
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: Cyberneid is an innovative startup specializing in artificial intelligence, electronic identity, and blockchain. Cyberneid designs, creates and manages services and software/hardware solutions, mobile and desktop, for: - the use of the electronic identity card; - the electronic passport; - the digital signature and certification of documents in compliance with the eIDAS regulation; - identity-proofing reinforced with Deep Learning; - eKYC optimized with Machine Learning and Deep Learning; - secure onboarding and strong authentication; - the management of virtual electronic identities on smartphones. - the blockchain especially regarding NFT and SBT. Cyberneid develops customized software, supplies SDKs and complete kits for ID-proofing, onboarding, eKYC, strong authentication, and digital signature procedures, and provides consultancy and training in blockchain, cybersecurity, and ICT security. Cyberneid is also a SPID service provider accredited by AgID. Cyberneid, for customers in the fintech, PA, healthcare, and utility sectors, has collectively certified over 1 million electronic identities and signed over 1.5 million documents while apps published on app stores have received over 1.5 million downloads. Among the main customers, Cyberneid includes: in Italy IPZS, PagoPA, Namirial, Campus Biomedico University of Rome, Don Gnocchi Foundation; in Croatia Zagrebacka Banka; in Azerbaijan the Ministry of Technology (MCHTC), AzInTelecom, AzPul.
Description: Cyberneid develops and offers solutions for identity proofing, KYC, digital signature, biometric recognition, biometric payments.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: Slymetrix Analytics is a tool that monitors in real-time the status of e-commerce traffic and sales in relation to planned objectives. It is a tool that allows every executive and operations manager to check, at a glance, the results of online sales in relation to the expected objectives for the period.  It can be installed and configured in just a few minutes without the need for any specific technical skills. Thanks to intuitive dashboards, it shows in real-time the results of visits and sales that the online shop is producing. In addition, with special indicators, you can see at a glance whether performance is good or bad. Slymetrix Analytics also offers the possibility of displaying dashboards in 16:9 so that they can be transmitted live on a TV monitor: if placed in your office, it allows you to quickly check the real-time performance throughout the day. In addition, the advanced versions allow the definition of advertising campaigns in the various digital media channels, building an inventory of channels organized by traffic providers. Once the definition is complete, for each channel of each campaign the platform generates a tracking url, through which it will be possible to monitor the performance of the campaigns and those of the digital media channels.  In conclusion, with Slymetrix Analytics every e-commerce retailer can boost its performance by optimizing its media investment by monitoring results according to budget forecasts. Why investing: Because Slymetrix is the key tool to enable e-commerce to improve its performance and thus achieve the expected economic goals (increase sales and profit by at least 30%). The e-commerce market is growing steadily and today has around 15 million online shops.  Because we have developed a 100% scalable Full SaaS business model, cloning successful international models with the intention of attracting the attention of large international groups interested in acquiring the startup (exit).  Because our goal is to achieve an exit within 3/5 years of incorporation that will allow investors in this round to get x10 return.  Market: Slymetrix is positioned in the Business Analytics Software Platforms market. The global Business Analytics Software market size was valued at $53.68 billion in 2019 and is expected to reach $120.27 billion by 2027, registering a CAGR of 10.5% from 2020 to 2027. Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence: We have laid the foundations for evolving our mathematical algorithms into Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence systems that will make decisions on behalf of platform users. The aim is for the tools themselves to suggest how to manage investments in order to improve performance.
Description: E-Commerce Business Analytics SaaS Tool
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: THE TACTIGON is a brand of NEXT INDUSTRIES srl, a 5 years old Company located 20 km East from Milan - Italy. The Company has the mission to develop IoT sensors, devices and gateways and to be highly innovative. With its tiny but high potential product line THE TACTIGON, the Company is going to revolutionize user experience with gesture controllers. THE TACTIGON team has produced TACTIGON-SKIN (or T-SKIN), a gesture controller with artificial intellingence algorithms and sensors on board, which solves the not-natural action of the traditional device during interactions with machines.  A mouse typically controls the motion of a pointer in two dimensions in a graphical user interface (GUI). The mouse turns movements of the hand backward and forward, left and right into equivalent electronic signals that in turn are used to move the pointer. Today the new user interface is very complicated with a lot of windows, dashboard and needs interaction with the object.  T-SKIN breaks all this by offering a light, tiny and fashion design device available for everyone, which is not a substitute but instead a complementary part for human machine interface. It's the first programmable (with Arduino also) fashion design hand band, the perfect link between Human and Digital Worlds. You can download the APP for T-SKIN directly from our SKETCH ARENA (our store) and it will turn into a man-machine interface, or a robot controller or a drone controller.  It is very easy to use thanks to its ergonomics form factor; T-SKIN has 4 programmable keys for different combination of hand movements and fingers.  If you use it with a 3D CAD, for example, you can rotate your left or right hand and the object on the screen will follow your movement. Or, you can feel holding the virtual object in your hands and looking at it in all its perspectives using also the key combinations to zoom in or out. KEY POINTS: artificial intelligence algorithms, revolutionary hand form factor, different sizes available, Arduino IDE compatible, SDK available, high accuracy. SENSORS ON BOARD: gyroscope, accelerometer, magnetometer, pressure, temperature.
Description: Gesture Controller for AR/VR, Robotics, Gaming applications with Arduino
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: Mine Crime is the social impacting project of the Innovative Startup (also recognised as a benefit corporation) SAFETECOM Srl SB, devoted to a clear vision: revolutionising the paradigm of urban security management. More precisely, Mine Crime is a software (progressive web-app) that, thanks to a proprietary algorithm, collects and systematises data on urban offences (by accessing both big data online and offline) within the first Italian thematic database accessible to corporates, citizens and any interested stakeholder. This makes it possible to provide citizens, corporates and public administrations with the first digital observatory (interactive Web-GIS) on urban micro-crimes updated in real time. In addition, thanks to our underneath analytical systems, Mine Crime is able to process and produce composite urban-risk indicators as predictors of criminogenic phenomena. In this way, citizens and corporates can benefit from a safer environment and therefore from lower social, collective and individual costs to be incurred because of crime and urban decay.

Traction: €215K revenues in 2021 (tripled vs 2019 totally self-funded), >10K Apps downloads, >7K web users and >21K monthly views; estimated €130mm revenues by 2026. Opinno, RollingStone) in May 2022. We are looking for a 1st round of funding to scale up fast, expanding our team, R&D, marketing investments and growing commercial partnerships.

Enco is a fundamental step towards a zero-emission economy, more people-centred than profit-centred.  How? By creating energy communities in a simple and transparent way, equipping citizens with the tools they need to produce energy on the roof of their homes, and share it with their neighbours, without having to deal with bureaucracy. Enco's vision is a world in which everyone benefits from the economic, environmental and social advantages of an energy community, and is empowered to produce energy.  Specifically? Enco installs photovoltaic panels and storage systems, creates and manages energy communities, and distributes the proceeds fairly among the participants. With Enco you can produce renewable energy, consume it, share it with your neighbours, save on your energy bills and contribute to a greener Italy.

Industry Groups: Education, Software
Full Description: Pathway S.r.l. is an AI-powered ed-tech company revolutionizing language exam preparation, starting with IELTS. Unlike traditional learning platforms that rely on static exercises and generic study plans, Pathway integrates contextual artificial intelligence, creating a personalized and adaptive learning experience for each student. At the heart of Pathway’s approach is its real-time AI tutor, which provides instant, tailored feedback on two of the most challenging IELTS components: speaking and writing. While most test prep solutions focus on passive learning—offering only mock exams and pre-recorded lessons—Pathway leverages AI to simulate real exam conditions, analyzing user responses and suggesting precise improvements. This interactive and dynamic methodology ensures students optimize their study time and maximize their scores with efficient, targeted practice. Beyond its innovative B2C model, Pathway is also developing a B2B offering for language schools and educational institutions, enabling them to integrate AI-driven learning into their existing curriculums. This makes Pathway a scalable and future-proof solution, not just for IELTS preparation but for a broader range of language certification exams. By combining cutting-edge AI, adaptive learning models, and a next-generation user experience, Pathway S.r.l. is redefining test preparation. It is not just a course, but an AI-powered learning ecosystem, designed to empower students and educators alike, delivering smarter, faster, and more effective language learning.
Description: Pathway is an AI-powered ed-tech company
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Other
Full Description: Peeki is an innovative startup born at the end of 2020 with the idea of ​​bringing the world of online and offline shopping together and working in synergy. What problem does it solve? A large number of purchases are concluded online due to lack of information: we did not know that the pair of trousers we were looking for, that particular size, was available in a shop in our city. Peeki promotes the purchase model that is called “ROPIS”: Reserve-Online-Purchase-In-Store. Through the proprietary marketplace it offers a service that allows: - The physical store to have a "Plug & Play" technological solution which operates on different levels of integration, capable of digitizing the warehouse, indexing products, making them visible and available online, in order to satisfy an highly geolocated users’ demand. Through the dashboard it is also possible to manage customer loyalty services such as discount and cashback campaigns, as well as the sale of gift vouchers. - The user has an online service which allows checking, in real time, the availability of products in the nearby stores, book the desired item, go directly to the store and decide whether to complete the purchase. What does it translate into? - saving of time and stress for the user due to continuous searches and phone calls. Buying in the store means trying and touching, no returns due to a wrong purchase. - economic support for commercial activities in the area - relationship of trust and loyalty that develops between customer and seller - makes it possible "last minute" purchase, which the e-commerce model cannot satisfy due to logistical reasons - benefit for the environment in terms of environmental impact resulting from CO2 equivalent emissions and packaging avoidance, as natural consequence of the drastic reduction in returns and reverse logistics (on average 1 out of 4 online fashion purchase is returned)
Description: Peeki is an innovative startup born with the idea of ​​bringing the world of online and offline shopping together and working in synergy.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: MyTutela is a personal security app that collects and stores digital evidence that lie on the smartphone, with forensics criteria. MyTutela collects texts messages, phone calls register and media, stores all information on a dedicated cloud and applies to each file a unique and universal algorithm that certifies its authenticity and immutability. For any digital evidence to be valid in Judicial proceedings, the integrity of the data must be proven. Given that there is often a high risk of alteration of data stored on devices, it can be difficult to prove the chain of custody. The application serves to avoid these issues by providing somewhere to store proofs in a forensically sound manner, even when the phone is lost and damaged. It is designed to tackle the difficulties that victims of stalking, harassment, bullying and other online offenses, face in providing evidence when filing a report. The app indeed produces a report, which can be printed and attached to a Police Complaint. Thus it encourages and supports victims to report crimes or offenses. Through the analysis of the utilized jargon, the context and frequency of the phrases used in the gathered files, MyTutela AI identifies the presence of risk elements for the users and suggests them the right professional to contact (lawyer, psychologist, forensics consultant), from its own database.
Description: MyTutela is a personal security app that collects and stores digital evidence that lie on the smartphone, with forensics criteria.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: At Circular Materials, we believe that valuable resources should be kept in the value chain and not lost to the environment. Our mission is to extend the lifetime of metals in the value chain and prevent the dispersion of critical raw materials by providing innovative and sustainable technologies. Our goal is to transform linear value chains into circular ones, providing scalable and cost-effective solutions for black mass recycling and industrial wastewater valorization to recover critical raw materials from waste streams. Our proprietary technologies and processes enable us to efficiently recover elements such as Nickel, Cobalt, Copper, Manganese and Lithium from industrial wastestreams, delivering secondary raw materials with low carbon footprint and high sustainability. We are dedicated to working with companies across various industries to optimize their operations, improve their sustainability profile, and gain a competitive edge in a rapidly evolving raw materials market. We are driven by our belief that a circular economy is not only possible but necessary to reduce waste, minimize reliance on expensive virgin materials, and build a more sustainable future. We are proud to be at the forefront of this movement, and we look forward to working with our partners and stakeholders to drive positive change in the industry and beyond.
Description: Circular Materials delivers sustainable & innovative solutions to recover critical raw materials from black mass and industrial wastewater.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: iUP S.r.l. is an innovative startup dedicated to the design and marketing of smartphone applications of its own conception. After its establishment in May 2018 by two operating shareholders and four capital shareholders, a prestigious investor joined the company in January 2020.  The company boasts a large and solid structure, based on the Open Innovation model, which currently has six people in the internal team, each of whom is responsible for a key area for the evolution of the project, who coordinate a total of twenty external collaborators.  Its operational HQ is located in Lomazzo, at the ComoNExT Scientific Technological Park, to which iUP got access after winning the "Business Incubator 2018" tender, promoted by the Chamber of Commerce of Como and by ComoNExT itself, emerging as the best startup among dozens of participants.  iUP is focused on the development of 2REC, an application designed to revolutionize the approach to voice messages and, more generally, to bring audio communication between people to a more advanced stage - an ambitious project that has allowed it to obtain numerous awards and is offering the company the opportunity to follow a significant path of internationalization.  For example, it has passed the selections for the "Global Startup Program" twice in a row; this is an initiative of the MISE promoted on the national territory. In 2019, this allowed it to participate in a three-month acceleration path in Silicon Valley at the Plug & Play Tech Center headquarters, one of the most renowned accelerator hubs in the world, while next summer, it allowed it to access the "International ScaleUp" program, also in the United States, at the "Mind The Bridge" accelerator in Los Angeles.  At the same time, ICE (the Agency for the promotion of Italian companies abroad) has called iUP twice to represent Italian tech innovation at the "Mobile World Congress" in Barcelona, the most prestigious mobile sector event in the world. After the 2020 presentation (unfortunately canceled following the Coronavirus emergency), it will participate in the 2021 iteration next June. Also, in collaboration with the ICE, iUP recently took part in the GITEX Future Stars in Dubai, the main technology event in the Middle East, and at the latest summit (this year in virtual form) of CES in Las Vegas, the most important digital-tech fair in the world during which the giants of the sector present their leading products.  Finally, iUP is among the candidates for being part of Italy's delegation at EXPO2020 in Dubai, which will have innovation in digital communication among its main themes.
Description: iUP S.r.l. is an innovative startup dedicated to the design, development, and marketing of smartphone applications of its own conception.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: Arbitryum is the Big Data enabler for the new generation of data-driven Price Comparison Websites (PCWs). They need to rethink the user interaction switching from a one-shot-visit website to a multi-channel approach with longer term relationship. For 10 years they have been focusing mainly on lead generation, now they need to open new revenue streams and we can help them by exploiting the Big Data opportunity. *Our solutions* Apps (collecting consumption data), Chatbots (intercepting people needs), Speedtest (analysing connection speed) and Data-driven APIs for repositioning PCWs from price comparison to digital personal advisor, with the power of data.

Full Description: Elyware s.r.l, the owner of Forsure app, offers a powerful password and file manager app that is designed with user privacy and security in mind. With Forsure, you can easily store and manage all your passwords, files, and sensitive information in one place, knowing that your data is encrypted and secured. Unlike other password managers, Forsure uses end-to-end encryption to ensure that your data is only decrypted on your device, without ever passing through a server. This makes Forsure one of the most secure password managers available. Forsure also functions as a file manager, allowing you to store, organize, and access your files from within the app. All files are also encrypted and secured using the same end-to-end encryption as password data. Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Science and Engineering
Full Description: Officinae Bio’s mission is to become the leading platform for building with biology.  Our platform integrates purpose-built experimental protocols, proprietary datasets and advanced design algorithms to accelerate product design and development, from personalized cell therapies to precision fermentation. Officinae Bio comes from the Latin word officinae meaning “the shop where things are designed and manufactured”. Our name reflects our mission to become the leading platform for biology design and build.  What are we building? We’re working to overcome the greatest challenges to a future built with biology; starting with the DNA at the core of all biological engineering. Vulcanus - automated pipelines for long and complex DNA constructs Vulcanus is the first AI-driven pipeline to automate the entire process of building large and complex DNA; from oligo design to fragment assembly. Vulcanus is capable of designing optimal protocols for the build of long and complex DNA constructs up to 50kbp at a 93% success rate - nearly double the success rate of industry standard in time frames that make possible rapid development and screening cycles. Named after the latin god of the forge. Vulcanus was believed to have built the most sophisticated items of ancient lore, including Jupiter’s lightning bolts and Mercury’s winged helm. Ulysses - navigate biological complexity to design superior products Having mastered DNA build, we are developing solutions to the next bottleneck to building with Biology: design.  Our Ulysses algorithm is enabling the smart navigation of complex option spaces when designing biological systems such as cell lines and strains. Ulysses leverages approaches for the design of the whole system rather than engineering individual parts. By recognizing the interconnectivity of all parameters and their nonlinear interactions of the system it allows for more robust, scaleable biological production and designs. Ulysses was the legendary Greek hero and king of Ithaca. His most famous journey was his ten-year struggle to return home through challenges and obstacles but he cleverly navigated through them with his wit and intellect. Next generation, scalable production systems With the foundations of DNA and design mastered, we are turning our unique approach to complexity, computation, automation and molecular biology to build the next generation of biological production systems.  Our unique approach aims to overcome the challenges to scalability, predictability and purity of microbial production systems.
Description: Biological design and manufacturing platform, from DNA synthesis to whole organisms.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: smartFAB is an off-the-shelf industrial analytics platform that empowers manufacturers of all sizes to optimize production while improving quality and reducing waste.  This disruptive innovation combines augmented data discovery, advanced analytics, and automated data storytelling into a single, integrated tool designed specifically for manufacturing. The solution employs automated machine learning and other forms of AI to rapidly and efficiently deliver actionable and explainable, cross-functional insights so that shop floor technicians, engineers and managers of all skillsets can monitor, analyze, and predict the operational performance of their manufacturing processes.  smartFAB is a machine learning as a service (MLaaS) solution. The company distributes its product direct to manufacturers (B2B) and via partnerships with manufacturing solution providers (B2B2B). The company has adopted a subscription revenue model and tiered pricing strategy, meaning manufacturers pay additional fees for higher levels of insights. It offers unlimited users. It was founded in 2018 by Ann LoCicero.

Full Description: Trusty, an innovative startup founded in 2022, specializes in blockchain-based end-to-end traceability solutions tailored for the agri-food sector. This platform, in development since 2020, currently benefits over 70 Italian companies. Trusty has acquired extensive expertise in the chocolate industry, having implemented their platform in three major industries. This implementation facilitates the tracking of over one hundred cooperatives and more than fifteen thousand farmers across seven countries. Leveraging this experience, Trusty is now revolutionizing the cocoa industry. They've launched a blockchain-enabled marketplace, which adheres to both the European Union Data Regulation (EUDR) and the Corporate Sustainability Due Diligence (CSDD). This marketplace is designed to promote ethical sourcing of high-quality cocoa by fostering direct connections between responsible producers and the industry. Trusty's platform not only enables transparent trade but also provides micro-financing opportunities. This initiative is pivotal in creating a more sustainable and equitable cocoa supply chain, ultimately benefiting cocoa farmers and the industry alike.

In a world where reading is neglected more and more each day, Readalyze is taking a new approach to remind students that reading is fun. We bring books to life using AI, creating immersive experiences that foster lasting reading habits and deepen students' love for books. Our platform adapts to each student’s strengths and weaknesses by design, personalizing every interaction to encourage growth and development. Beyond enhancing the student reading experience, Readalyze empowers educators with powerful analytics tools that provide real-time insights into individual and class-wide progress. Teachers can easily track key metrics related to language acquisition, emotional intelligence, and critical thinking, allowing them to tailor instruction to meet each student's unique needs. Based in Milan and founded by passionate book lovers from Bocconi University, Readalyze is more than just a platform—it’s a movement to redefine the future of reading and education. Whether you're an educator, a parent, or an investor seeking to make a meaningful impact, join us in shaping the next generation of readers. Follow us on LinkedIn and Instagram for the latest updates and innovations in educational technology!
Description: Bringing books to life for students.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: Mody.ai is a pioneering tech company at the forefront of artificial intelligence (AI)-driven sizing solutions in the e-commerce industry. We utilize advanced body scanning technology to accurately determine a person's dimensions using two simple photos taken with any mobile device. Our user-friendly process provides accurate size recommendations within five seconds, eliminating the need for additional apps or for customers to leave the retailer's website. One of the significant benefits we offer to fashion companies is a significant reduction in returns due to sizing errors. By providing precise sizing recommendations, we can increase customer satisfaction and decrease associated logistical costs. We also help fashion companies increase their conversion rates. Our technology gives visitors to your site access to personalized size suggestions based on their body measurements. This increased confidence in size selection leads to more completed purchases and lower cart abandonment rates. The accuracy and ease of use of our technology significantly improve the user experience. The size selection process becomes simple and engaging, which encourages customers to complete purchases and return in the future. As a result, it fosters customer loyalty and helps build strong, lasting relationships with your brand. Through our interactive dashboard, we provide invaluable data analysis, helping fashion companies optimize their stock management. By knowing your customers' body dimensions, you can ensure better product availability, reduce waste, and cut associated costs. We enable fashion companies to target their marketing more effectively. By informing your customers about the last sizes available based on their body measurements, you can optimize marketing expenditure and enhance the value of the shopping experience. Lastly, we are committed to supporting the fashion industry's sustainability efforts. Our solution helps reduce CO2 emissions associated with returns and minimizes waste. With Mody.ai, fashion companies can not only streamline their operations but also enhance their customers' shopping experience and make strides towards a more sustainable business model.
Description: Mody.ai leverages AI to optimize sizing in e-commerce, reducing returns and enhancing user experience.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

We will respectfully, discreetly stand by the entrepreneurs believing in these ideas, from the beginnings and at least since that impact leaves its first dent. We care about each startup in our portfolio getting the full value a hundred years old education company like Zanichelli can offer, wherever our expertise can be a lodestar because of our history, our mission, our network, our resources; and we believe in getting out of the founders’ way otherwise, if we don’t add value. We care about financial returns and self-sustainability and about bringing collaboration opportunities, insights, innovative thinking and entrepreneurial energy back to our company digital products designers, editorial staff and IT, searching for mutual advantages. Only in the long term, as we and the founders build trust through intense collaboration and shared stakes, and after a startup fully spreads out its potential as a maturing company, we believe in searching together for possible paths to a deeper partnership. Full Description: Dock3 - The Startup Lab is the entrepreneurship program of Roma Tre University. It is aimed for 34,000 members and about 100,000 graduates of the 12 Departments of the University, but is also open to students, graduates and researchers who can contribute their skills to the development of a business project for the RomaTre students. The course derived from the University's desire to invest on the entrepreneurship of the students, as well as the commitment and passion of two University professors: professor Paolo Merialdo (Engineering Department) and Carlo Alberto Pratesi (Department of Business Studies and University Delegate to Startups). Both professors are cofounders of InnovActionLab , which has trained more than 800 people and has given rise to over 40 startups in 4 years. The program is coordinated by Andrea Dal Piaz, engaged for more than 10 years in training and support for entrepreneurial development in Italy and in Africa. Dock3 - The Startup Lab is a program of the RomaTre University, in collaboration with " Started ", a project funded by the European Commission designed to develop the entrepreneurial skills of researchers.

Full Description: EG MEDIA is a For Benefit innovative start-up, publishing an online magazine analyzing brands' claims on Environmental, Social and Governance (ESG) topics  In 2018 22% of commercial during the Superbowl were on goodvertising and 15 out of 27 of the Cannes Lions awards were handed to purposeful campaigns . Both in terms of the absolute numbers and relative percentages, corporates are now creating more award-winning work with a higher purpose, compared to non-profit. Unfortunately, there are a lot of ‘purpose driven campaigns’ created for companies that aren’t actually facing a radical change. Our mission is to strengthen the importance of truth-in-advertising and help brands improve their discourse on sustainability.  The project aims to develop a solution to determine the trustworthiness of brand claims on Environmental, Social and Governance (ESG) topics through Artificial Intelligence. If we succeed, we’ll allow consumers to get safe information about sustainable actions companies advertise. We’ll also let sustainable and responsible companies play within an equitable and fair arena against crafty competitors.
Description: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE FOR SUSTAINABLE BRANDS

Full Description: At Wrento, we understand that finding the perfect place to call home can be a daunting task, especially in today's fast-paced world. That's why we've dedicated ourselves to simplifying the process, providing a hassle-free, and innovative solution to the complex real estate market. Wrento is your trusted partner in locating, securing, and enjoying the ideal living space. Our Mission: Our mission is simple but powerful: to redefine the way people find and rent homes. We aim to revolutionize the real estate industry by offering a convenient, transparent, and efficient platform for both renters and property owners. By leveraging cutting-edge technology, Wrento aims to make the rental experience as seamless as possible, creating a win-win situation for all involved. Our Services: Extensive Property Listings: Wrento provides an extensive database of carefully curated properties, from stylish apartments in the heart of the city to cozy suburban homes. Our listings are accompanied by high-quality photos, detailed descriptions, and virtual tours to help you make informed decisions from the comfort of your own home. Transparent Pricing: We believe in transparency. Wrento provides clear and upfront pricing, including all associated costs, so you can easily compare properties and make an informed choice. Verified Listings: Say goodbye to scams and false advertising. Our team rigorously verifies each listing to ensure accuracy, safety, and reliability. Online Booking: Renting your dream home has never been easier. With Wrento, you can book your chosen property online in just a few clicks, eliminating the hassle of endless paperwork and time-consuming negotiations. At Wrento, we're not just a real estate company; we're your partner in finding the place you'll proudly call home. Discover a new way to rent today with Wrento and experience the future of real estate. Your dream home is just a click away.
