Founders: Alessandro Lazzari, Andrea Ferrante, Marco Pugliese
Industry Groups: Energy, Internet Services, Sustainability, Transportation
Full Description: The idea behind Walle Mobility is to allow air travel in a simple and fast way, in just one click. Walle’s mission is to revolutionize urban and interurban mobility in the next 10 years, operating within the UAM (Urban Air Mobility) market, in strong worldwide expansion. Walle’s mission is to eliminate traffic and allow movements first interurban and then urban avoiding hours and hours of traffic from the city. We want to start with Milan. Milan is one of the most mature cities in Europe as sharing mobility. From 2004 until today, Milan Municipality signed agreements with seven car-sharing operators, eight scooter-sharing operators, and three bike-sharing operators. Urban Air Mobility (UAM) is going to be a real opportunity and we would like to launch the service during Milano – Cortina 2026 Winter Olympic Games. Air Mobility would be the best solution to smartly move both athletes and wealthy travelers between different areas of cities. AIR - Since the beginning, our goal has been connecting ground-to-air with a click: so-called “taxi drones” have been included in our project. Nowadays UAM is just a project, an idea, and taxi drone services seem to be only a product of an SCI-FI writer but, then: why are we considering it? As said above, UAM offers incredible potential and a revolutionary scenario of travel between cities and suburbs. People's minds will soon be ready, authorities are working towards it, manufacturers are building, testing and certifying their aircraft while Walle is… already there. We want to be one of the first UAM service providers in the world because we strongly believe that this method of transportation, will allow both passengers and goods to travel very quickly through the cities with a fraction of relative costs. As part of the business model, we will be also renting the facilities like vertiports to other operators that will come afterward. By 2050 we will be ten billion on Earth! Of these 10 billion, almost seven billion will live in urban centers. Imagine the cities of the future. Imagine the links between regional cities and imagine the traffic! The biggest problem in the cities of the future will be one: traffic. Imagine the traffic pollution. Imagine the travel between one city to another that will become slower and slower. This problem will be very dangerous also for the people who will use your car for regionals travel. Cities link will be slower and the stress will growth.
Description: "Walle allows you to make short/medium-range air travel in half-time, eliminating traffic stress through a simple, and fast service. "
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: Ubiquitous is an innovative startup born in the laboratories of Sapienza University of Rome, specializing in Video Intelligence solutions. Our mission is to bring artificial intelligence to cameras worldwide, offering an advanced platform that enables real-time video monitoring, management, and insights. Ubiquitous aims to revolutionize the surveillance and monitoring industry by integrating edge computing technologies that ensure data privacy and security. Our platform is compatible with all IP cameras that support the RTSP standard, offering a seamless, scalable solution for industries such as smart cities, Industry 4.0, healthcare, and agriculture. By transforming passive video feeds into actionable data, Ubiquitous allows businesses and organizations to actively manage daily operations instead of relying on periodic video reviews. This shift in paradigm helps reduce hardware and maintenance costs, eliminates vendor lock-in, and brings advanced automation capabilities to everyday operations. Ubiquitous stands out for its commitment to innovation and security. With a focus on privacy and data protection, our platform securely analyzes video streams, making us a leader in the future of Video Intelligence. Designed to adapt to the evolving needs of modern businesses, Ubiquitous delivers a flexible, user-friendly platform that enhances operational efficiency while ensuring the highest data security standards.
Description: Bring AI to your cameras

The system identifies, in a legally relevant way, the users and divides them into categories. Each category can perform different operations.  The documents can be of any form and can be "sent for viewing" or, if required, transferred. Some examples: - Documents issued by a body attesting a quality: e.g. degree, the university creates (or uploads) the certificate on the platform and sends it to the graduate. - Documents issued by an entity and which can pass from hand to hand: e.g. guarantee certificates or bearer bonds. Our first product: Watch The Watch is a web-based platform that aims to combat counterfeiting and fraud in the luxury watch industry. The manufacturer will generate a digital certificate of guarantee and authenticity that will follow the watch throughout its life cycle, automatically updating the information over time. In this way, users and intermediaries will be able to prove, even in the second wrist market, that the watch is original and not stolen. The user application will be used both to store the certificates and to transfer them after sale.
Description: Send and track your documents with the legal value superior to traditional methods. Easy, fast and intuitive
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Industries: 3D Printing, Dental, Education, Health Care, Medical Device, Software
Industry Groups: Education, Health Care, Manufacturing, Software
Full Description: Oral3D is the startup bringing 3D printing to dentists. The Oral3D package has all it is needed to create 3D printed models of the patients’ oral cavity with no effort. The Oral3D software and 3D printer do not require any technical knowledge or training. It takes just a couple of minutes to process and send to the 3D printer any CT scan, cone beam or intra-oral scan.  Oral3D models improve dentist-patient communication, which is associated with more accurate diagnosis, better commitment of the patient during the treatment, improved outcomes, and less likelihood of complaints or litigation. In addition, the models support treatment planning and surgical rehearsals, favoring greater efficiency and accuracy.  The use of 3D printing models in dental offices is nowadays crucial in the communication between patients and dentists, making the planning of the treatment easier and increasing the satisfaction. Also the use of the model makes it easier for the dentist to plan the intervention, avoiding to directly plan it in the patient's mouth and decreasing discomfort. Last but not least, the 3D models can be very useful in seminars and lessons, where normally are used standardised models that don't really reflect a real patient's situation. Oral3D offers a unique solution, made by 3D printer and software, the only one existing capable of directly translating a CT Scan into a STL file, ready to print. Normally it takes technical help, money and time for a dentist to translate a CT Scan into a printable model, Oral3D's software does it automatically in a few minutes.
Description: 3D Printing for dentists
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Industries: Internet, Messaging, Real Time, Social Network, Software
Industry Groups: Information Technology, Internet Services, Messaging and Telecommunications, Other, Software
Full Description: When visiting a website, people may be at home, in the office, on a train, or anywhere in the real world. But they are also on a web page. That page is like a virtual place where they may meet other people. However, traditionally a web visitor didn’t have any means to know if he or she was the only one on that page at that moment or if there was anyone else. With Now4real, web visitors can see in real time how many people are actually displaying that page. And they can chat with one another. This way, web pages become live virtual places, and browsing the Web is like going around in the real world: wherever they are, people see if there are others around them (presence counters), and they have a chance to interact with them (pagechats).
Description: Now4real connects the people who happen to be visiting the same web page at the same time, enabling the birth of instant communities.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Natural Index aims at promoting a sustainable approach to search engine optimization, based on a profound understanding of algorithm dynamics and on the employment of natural practices. The company is exclusively focused on natural search engine optimization and is part of an international group with offices in Italy and San Francisco (US). Born as a group brand from the partnership between two companies that were active since 2008, "Natural index Group" became Natural Index Srl in October 2021, absorbing the operational structures of the two entities. Thanks to one of the founding companies' background as a software developer and system integrator, the Natural Index’s SEO team has the ability to dialogue with software engineers in order to ensure the most effective technical and architectural choices for the search engine. Today, Natural Index is one of the top SEO agencies in Italy and aims at becoming one of the leading international players by pursuing a hyper-specialisation strategy in order to promote the skills and experience acquired over years of work, optimising hundreds of projects, including some of the most important international websites. The Natural Index team is composed of some of the most respected SEO specialists in the world. Among its founders there are professionals that started doing SEO in 2003. The knowledge gained through the optimization of some of the biggest websites and the passion for natural and ethical SEO make our team the ideal partner to successfully develop any organic visibility project in local and international markets.

Full Description: Each year more than 250 million people live outside their Country of birth. 90% of global migration today is due to economic reasons. People move to find better work and life opportunities. Mygrate is an online marketplace that connects them to Migration Experts. The platform pre-assesses migrants and provides migration professionals with quality leads which let them make money offering viable solutions for relocating. Migrating is a life-changing experience that exposes people to a significant investment of psychological and emotional resources. Mygrate facilitates the process by providing a direct contact with a migration expert of choice. Mygrate also enables migration professionals to promote their business and improve their online presence. International mobility is rapidly increasing. Migration is a resource, but it needs to be better channelled. Mygrate aims to optimize it while empowering all the people involved in the process. Individuals have better and reliable information. Professionals expand and improve their business. Organisations streamline the process to find more and skilled resources from anywhere in the world. Migration has many aspects and impacts on our society in different ways. Considering the global scale and nature of the phenomenon, profoundly embedded in the human life, Mygrate can easily include additional related services, expand to any Country and become the go-to hub for all migration matters.
Description: Migration Experts Marketplace

Full Description: Walery è un provider di servizi e di hosting web che offre soluzioni personalizzate per le esigenze dei propri clienti. Uno dei principali vantaggi offerti da Walery è la sua flessibilità. Gli utenti possono scegliere liberamente i servizi a loro necessari, in modo da poter ottenere la soluzione più adatta alle loro esigenze. Inoltre, l'azienda offre anche un servizio di assistenza clienti tramite chat e ticket interni disponibile da Lunedì a Venerdì. I tecnici invece monitorano ed intervengono sui server 24 ore su 24, 7 giorni su 7, per mitigare entro poco tempo qualsiasi problema. I server dell'azienda offrono anche una serie di strumenti di sviluppo per aiutare i clienti a creare e gestire i loro siti web, tra cui cPanel, PHP, MySQL e molto altro ancora. In conclusione, Walery è un provider di servizi web affidabile e flessibile.

Full Description: Plasma Dynamics StartUp By very powerful team, which includes professors, young scientists and engineers with extensive experience in Plasma Technologies, we will be able to provide the high-quality research, development and manufacturing of any types of Plasma Systems. Our Researches & Developments are: Plasma Gasification/Pyrolysis of Municipal/Medical Solid Waste (MSW) Component Of Integrated Waste Recycling: The main advantage of the proposed Plasma Treatment technology by Plasma Dynamics srl is the absence of combustion (oxidation) in the  municipal/medical waste disposal cycle without increasing economical parameters. This sharply reduces the possibility of the formation of hazardous substances such as dioxins, furans, NOx and SOx. This technology makes it possible to obtain zero emissions into the environment through waste processing. Microwave Plasma Filter: The technology is based on the basic properties of microwave plasma, which make it possible to very effectively act on a number of carbon-containing substances, including gaseous ones, from the point of view of their destruction. During this process, dusts and toxic gases are transformed into completely environment friendly components according to U.S. EPA and EU EEA regulation. As United States and European regulations are now focused on reducing Greenhouse gases, mainly Carbon Dioxide (CO2), in Plasma Dynamics srl, we are research and developing the Microwave Plasma Technology to solve this issue.  Plasma Engine:  Plasma Dynamics Team has great experience in developing of Plasma Propulsion Systems for Space and Defence applications, science-based capabilities in support of the current and future of Plasma Engines related R&D. Multiphysics Simulation:  Plasma Dynamics uses advanced FEA, CFD and particle-in-cell (PIC) codes, developed for simulation-based design.
Description: Plasma Hydrogen Production, Waste Plasma Treatment, Microwave Plasma Cracking of gas, Plasma Gasification/Pyrolysis, Waste to Clean Energy,
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Industry Groups: Apps, Information Technology, Software
Full Description: They live in a generation where the use of social media is becoming too important for their lives. In addition to sharing information and content, social media have become very popular because they allow people to use the internet to establish personal or business relationships. It is said that social media serves to compensate for the lack of sociality of the modern and post-industrial era. But is it really possible to define ‘sociality’ an interaction or approach among individuals in a totally virtual way? Social living should be built on natural social interactions. They should go back to verbal confrontation, to communicate through words, looks, and try to avoid confrontation with other individuals just behind a computer screen or a smartphone. But if a person wants to organize a real activity involving other people using some popular social media, how can he organize it without first knowing these individuals? For those reasons It’s been developed a new platform to promote the return to classical social interactions and to get to know new people without the use of instant messaging, promoting the ‘face to face’ socializing instead of a virtual acquaintanceship, this innovative platform allows people to organize activities all over the world involving all its users, without having to personally know the participants in the activities, and without having to spend hours in front of a keyboard or a phone screen.
Description: Plansaround promotes the return to classical social interactions and to get to know new people without the use of instant messaging.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: MyWosh is a cutting-edge cloud-based platform that digitalises the operations of laundries and dry cleaners. It provides an all-in-one solution for laundry business management, including Point-of-Sales management, CRM, production tracking, analytical reporting, and a customer mobile application that enable online  on-demand services and payments.  Unlike other laundry management systems, MyWosh stands out with its simplicity, user-friendliness, and innovation. It integrates three main services - a cloud-based POS, QR-code technology, and a customer mobile app. This allows laundries and dry cleaners to track garments and provide real-time updates to customers, who can also request pickups, deliveries, and make payments through the app. MyWosh simplifies the daily business process of laundry and dry-cleaning operators by streamlining customer management, order booking, order tracking, garment processing, and payments. It provides a convenient and efficient solution for organising and managing tasks, making it easier to meet the needs of customers and run the business smoothly.

Full Description: Carofiglio represents, with its story, fashion and elegance in Cosenza since 1926. It opens its exclusive store, Carofiglio Junior, specifically dedicated to kidswear in 1995, with many representative and prestigious luxury brands. Our fashion store is placed in Corso Mazzini, the main street of shopping in Cosenza, which is now also the hearth of MAB: Bilotti open Museum of Contemporary Arts, where modern sculptures and fashion create together a perfect union. Carofiglio Junior and its team offers you all its know how to give you a special and unique shopping experience, a glamorous itinerary among luxury Italian and International top brands . Here you can find all neon colors from Kenzo’s fashion jungle, the funny and iconic prints by Moschino, the street style by Dsquared2 with its distressed denim, the comfortable and innovative fabrics by Stella McCartney. You will discover all the baroque elegance by Young Versace with its micro studs and Medusa buckles, Sicily theme and precious brocades by Dolce & Gabbana, a glam rock style with Philip Plein and its studded leather. If it’s not enough, you can chose a simply perfect English style for little ladies and lords with Burberry, candy colors and weightless chiffon, Swarovski and precious details by Miss Blumarine. If you are really fashion addict you can’t do without “mini me” Fendi logo bags and scarves, Versace precious mini shoulder bags and flats, Burberry change bags and trench coats, Stella McCartney little monsters and super heroes, Chloé pale romantic colors for newborn or Little Marc Jacobs extravagant colored prints. Our web site is a wide showcase of the most important fashion brands of the world so that you can choose only all the best for your kids. Carofiglio Junior guarantees you the authenticity and the high quality of each single item of clothing and accessory for a perfect and secure shopping experience.
Description: SRL

Industries: Art, E-Learning, Museums and Historical Sites
Industry Groups: Education, Media and Entertainment, Software, Travel and Tourism
Full Description: ArtCentrica is an innovative startup and an EdTech solution that addresses the education market, a growing sector, reinforced by the pandemic situation. In this context, the cultural digital transformation has become an increasingly urgent need, and at the same time it also has made the development of new ways of teaching and learning. Therefore, guaranteeing access to cultural heritage online is fundamental for our future. ArtCentrica, has been designed and developed since the end of 2019 by Centrica - Italian company leader in Digital sector for the cultural heritage enhancement -, and allows teachers and students to visualize in intimate detail, compare, virtually measure, correlate artworks, and create lessons that can be used inside and outside the classroom.  The cloud application contains more than 7.000 artworks from global museums like Uffizi Galleries, Brera Museum, the MET, Rijksmuseum, Central Graphic Institute in Rome, Cleveland Museum of Art, Finnish National Museum, Museo Egizio, Reims Musée des Beaux-Arts, Art Institute of Chicago, SMK (Statens Museum for Kunst), Staedel Museum and 30 Florentine views, with images in very high resolution, up to 10 GigaPixel for each artwork.  It is possible to appreciate intimate details of masterpieces from Leonardo da Vinci, Botticelli, Caravaggio and other hundreds of artists, due to GigaPixel images and enabling technologies, with a quality of images and associated knowledge that is not available in the market.  Because of its valuable features, ArtCentrica has been recognized among the best ICT tools for teaching and learning by Reimagine Education 2020 (December 2020) and has been awarded by National Geographic in GESAwards That’s Geography special track (January 2021). Moreover, ArtCentrica has been selected for the following acceleration/prizes: Third Call of the European project IMPACT EdTech (November 2021) FuturED’s acceleration path (January 2022) by CDP Venture Capital SGR - National Innovation Fund Accelerate Italy acceleration for US market  (July 2022) FoundersBoost acceleration program (August 2022) CultTech acceleration program (September 2022) Global Startup Program in San Francisco (October 2022) Apollo Awards 2022, shortlist “Digital Innovation of the Year” (December 2022)
Description: ArtCentrica the art learning revolution
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: WhoTeach is a B2B intelligent digital learning platform that helps training institutions and companies to create and deliver high-quality online courses by optimizing the use of resources. The platform enables an easy management of synchronous and asynchronous training through the synergy between its components, their modularity and adaptability to various training contexts. It is equipped with AI to support teachers and experts in creating and managing training paths in a customized manner. The platform consists of four distinct and individually usable modules:  ● WT Artificial Intelligence is an innovative Recommendation System (RS) developed with Machine Learning and Deep Learning techniques, which supports lecturers in searching and selecting teaching material, using resources contained in internal or external repositories. The Recommendation System suggests the most suitable resources for the course based on the rules set by the lecturer. ● WT Learning Management System is a learning management system that allows high quality courses to be created and delivered asynchronously, with flexibility in course structure and materials to be made available. In addition, it offers a number of sophisticated learning verification and learner activity tracking systems. ● WT Live is a tool for delivering training in synchronous mode, through virtual classrooms equipped with numerous features to facilitate interaction between teacher and learners and between learners themselves. The virtual classrooms offer the possibility of creating break-out rooms, where learners can work in groups, and have tracking tools to certify learner attendance. ● WT Social E-Portfolio is a tool for tracking skills and publishing information related to educational and professional experiences, which also allows students to share ideas, create communities of practice and interact with other students, lecturers and experts.
Description: WhoTeach is a B2B digital intelligent learning platform that helps training institutions and HR managers to create online courses
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

The affiliated stores also become the "territorial hubs" to which the orders collected through Unyli e-commerce site are diverted. Full Description: We do the Heavy Lifting so You Focus on Truly Experiencing Your Trip with your favourite people! A single platform to plan group weekend getaways from A to Z. Remote decision-making and a one-on-one approach as the key to seamless group travel planning. Find which destinations are a fit, the best matching flights, book in a click, and create an efficient tailor-made itinerary in minutes with the Trippers mobile app.  Who hasn't experienced frustration when planning a trip with friends? All the decisions that need to get made, nobody taking the lead, and the conversation dying out. Trippers is here to solve this problem and make your next trip a reality. An idea that spun from personal experience, we got together as a group of friends to create what we've always dreamed we'd have, a travel assistant that walks us through each step of the travel planning process, from the early days of simply deciding on a date for the trip to the final decisions of where to stop for coffee on our way.  Trippers will be launching in Q1 2021, here to reunite you with your friends after a whole year of social distancing!

Full Description: ArteInVivo's is a service company and a freemium web platform promoting cultural exchange, supporting artists, and enriching the travel experiences of tourists through the lens of live art and innovative technology. By blending cultural appreciation with sustainable tourism practices, we contribute positively to the communities we engage with while creating memorable and transformative experiences for our audience.Live Art Experiences: At ArteInVivo, the core of the cultural holiday revolves around live art performances. Travelers have the opportunity to witness captivating concerts, theatrical plays, dance shows, and other interactive art forms that celebrate the local culture and heritage.Technology Integration: The festival utilizes new technologies to enhance the art experiences. This might involve interactive installations, virtual reality exhibits, or multimedia displays that create a more engaging and dynamic encounter with the art. Active and Participatory Tourism: Unlike traditional cultural holidays where tourists are passive observers, ArteInVivo encourages active and participatory engagement. Travelers can take part in workshops, hands-on activities, and cultural exchanges, fostering a deeper connection to the destination.Sustainable Practices: ArteInVivo promotes sustainable tourism by supporting local communities and businesses. We use eco-friendly venues, offer locally sourced food options, and strive to minimize the environmental impact of our events. Community Building: The festival provides a platform for artists, travelers, and locals to come together, fostering a sense of community. This creates a more inclusive and collaborative environment, enriching the cultural experience for all involved. This forward-thinking approach keeps the festival fresh and exciting year after year. Enriching Cultural Packages: ArteInVivo designs cultural holiday packages that go beyond the standard tourist offerings. These packages are carefully curated to provide travelers with a well-rounded and transformative experience of the destination's cultural heritage. By offering this new way to live a cultural holiday, ArteInVivo sets a precedent for the future of sustainable and immersive travel experiences. Travelers can explore the heart and soul of a region through live art, connect with local communities, and make lasting memories that leave a positive impact on both themselves and the places they visit. As more festivals and cultural events adopt similar principles, we can pave the way for a more meaningful and enriching form of tourism worldwide.
Description: ArteInVivo creates web portal for the diffusion of new contents in live streaming and video on demand.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
